summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5517 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 14, First Plat of West Seattle by the West Seattle Land and Improvement Co., being the alley between 42nd Avenue Southwest and Palm Avenue, from Palm Avenue on the north to Palm Avenue on the south; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 70611, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
